name: Split N Shoot
description:
This was our FIRST game 🚀 we finished it in early 2017 and never saw light until now.

This is a simple space shooter game where you can move only right and left with the ability to split the space jet generating a force field that charges by passing enemies through it.

The game has 9 levels with 3 bosses 👹👹👹. 

As we like to experiment with ideas like everyone else, this was our first complete experiment 😄 and you probably have already guessed this is not a good game 😓, but we would like to share with everyone our first and not last failure. 

We learned a lot in game design, programming and management while building this game and really enjoyed it hoping that we will avoid doing same mistakes in the future.

Pew Pew & Have Fun 🚀🚀🚀
